name: bread_housing_application
description: front end for SF/HAP App integration

scripts.sf-deploy:
cd .. && mavensmate compile src/staticresources/housing_application.resource &> sf.log && grep -o 'Succeeded' sf.log | tr -d '
' | awk '{if (length($1) > 0) print "Synced to SF"; else print "Failed SF sync"; }' && rm sf.log
scripts.build:deploy: npm run build && npm run sf-deploy

author: Andrew Lomax
